originalText.text: My husband and I would highly recommend working with Caligaris!! Niki and Joey in NYC in particular were awesome. We really didn't know what type of furniture we wanted or what would fit in our new home. They came and measured rooms, showed us a variety of options and let us know what was in and what was not. They have a strong eye for what looks fashion foward, what is functional, and what will work for their customers! They are also fast workers so you are not drained through the process. We would highly recommend you meet them and see if it works for you, it worked for us!

originalText.text: I purchased the Easytime sectional and worked with Joey. As an interior designer, I normally deal with very high-end vendors, however I needed a sectional that was not outrageously priced, yet still offered great quality and design. I remembered the brand from working with a client in London many years ago and was excited to see they had a store in NYC. The sectional was recently delivered and it absolutely blew me away. The comfort, quality, service experience, etc. Joey made the experience highly efficient by being knowledgeable, responsive and offering accurate updates regarding the lead time, etc. Truly exceeded my expectations.

originalText.text: Where do I even begin? We know Camerich from their stores in London, where we used to live. My visit to Camerich New York was nothing short of mind-blowing! The staff? Oh my goodness, they were like old friends from the moment I walked in, super friendly and genuinely excited to help. And let's talk about the furniture selection, it's like they've captured every style and vibe imaginable under one roof, ready for lightning-fast delivery. Quality and price? Let's just say I had to pinch myself it's that good. Oh, and did I mention they can turn your furniture dreams into reality with custom options? Huge kudos to Giovanni, a salesperson extraordinaire who practically read my mind. Trust me, this place isn't a showroom; it's a slice of furniture heaven right in the heart of New York!

originalText.text: We ordered a pendant light fixture from Camerich as a "sample" to see if we liked it – and then UPS tracking indicated that it was  "lost". Nuri Tombuloglu worked closely with us to resolve the issue and a replacement was sent out immediately. When the replacement came, so did the original order (so now we had 2). We added 3 more to our order for a total of 5 pendant light fixtures for our new kitchen, and was pleased to receive them perfectly packaged and in record time. Nuri was wonderful to work with! IWe can't thank him enough for all the time he spent with us. Camerich has beautiful light fixtures, good pricing, and the attention to our needs is not found at most stores – online or in person. Thank you Nuri!
